sql-statement.sql: select pm.ids as ids, (select ps.names from pt_systems ps where ps.ids = pm.systemsIds) as names, pm.isParent, pm.images from pt_module pm where pm.parentModuleIds is null order by pm.orderIds asc
select ids, names, isParent , images from pt_module where parentModuleIds = ? order by orderIds asc
select ids, names from pt_operator where moduleIds = ? order by url asc
